another_site_heading: Did you follow a link from another site?
another_site_paragraph: Links from other sites can sometimes be outdated or misspelled. Let me know where you came from and I can try to contact the other site in order to fix the problem.
contact_support: Please <link>email me</link> if you need further assistance.
our_site_heading: Did you follow a link from within this site?
our_site_paragraph: If you reached this page from another part of the site, please let me know so I can correct the mistake.
typo_paragraph: You may have typed the address incorrectly. Check to make sure you’ve got the exact right spelling, capitalization, etc.
